purpose: Phase-O governs implementation of the planning runtime under strict governance. This phase does not enable execution, autonomy, or activation.
preconditions_confirmed: No planning runtime implementation existed prior to entry
Execution and autonomy remain denied by default
explicit_constraints: No autonomy or goal generation permitted
All changes must be auditable and fail-closed under PXL governance
notes: Phase-O entered in implementation-only mode. Execution and autonomy remain prohibited until explicitly authorized in a later phase.
